title: Motley Fool Money:  6.18.2010
description: BP agrees to set up a $20 billion escrow account. The price of gold hits an all-time high.  Facebook's COO questions the future of email. And Starbucks announces plans for free WiFi.    On this week's show, we tackle those questions, talk BP with The Motley Fool UK's David Kuo, and share three stocks on our radar.
content:encoded: BP agrees to set up a $20 billion escrow account. The price of gold hits an all-time high.  Facebook's COO questions the future of email. And Starbucks announces plans for free WiFi.    On this week's show, we tackle those questions, talk BP with The Motley Fool UK's David Kuo, and share three stocks on our radar.
